name: Save the relics
description:
ATTENTION! THE HTML 5 VERSION OF THIS GAME IS AN INCOMPLETE POST-JAM PROTOTYPE! IF YOU ARE USING A WINDOWS MACHINE, WE STRONGLY RECOMMEND DOWNLOADING THE WINDOWS-EXECUTABLE!

Summary
As a priest of an isolated magnificent church, you're surrounded by a huge crowd of intruding monsters. Your task is to protect the relics with your life. Move objects, evade demons and watch out for next incoming monsters. Stress, threat and your own tininess will define your game experience!

Gameplay
Use the arrow keys to move the priest. The flashing windows indicate where the monsters will appear next. Save the relics by pushing them to a save spot or kill the monsters by making them run into your altar. You cannot push any object to the outermost tiles.

the outermost tiles.
